entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -13.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -13.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -15.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
